Class Message

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Message extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a message sent from one user to another in the Jackut system. This class implements Serializable to allow message persistence.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(String senderSessionId, String receiverLogin, String text, User sender)
      Constructs a message with sender, receiver, and content.
      Parameters:
      senderSessionId - The session ID of the user who sent the message.
      receiverLogin - The login of the user who will receive the message.
      text - The content of the message.
      sender - The User object representing the sender.

  • Method Details

    • getText

      public String getText()
      Gets the message content.
      Returns:
      The message text.

    • getSenderSessionId

      public String getSenderSessionId()
      Gets the session ID of the user who sent the message.
      Returns:
      The sender's session ID.

    • getSender

      public User getSender()
      Gets the User object representing the sender.
      Returns:
      The sender User object.

    • getReceiver

      public String getReceiver()
      Gets the login of the user who received the message.
      Returns:
      The receiver's login.
